attributes.action: Elect michael Gove as PM of conservatives
attributes.additional_details: Michael Gove for PM of conservative party as he was a leave campaigner and can negotiate our exit from the eu
attributes.background: Elect michael Gove to PM of conservatives

rejection.details: In any case, as you might already know, the Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament, and the leadership of the Conservative party is a party political matter.
